name: woven plant pants
description: A pair of plants, woven from braided cordage of several plants. Fragile and without any pockets, but keeps you warm to a degree.

name: woven plant shirt
description: A long sleeved shirt, woven from braided cordage of several plants. Quite rough on the skin to wear.

name: woven plant cloak
description: A bulky cloak woven from the cordage of several plants. Not the most comfortable, but with a simple hood to keep your head warm.

name: wood plate
description: Crude body armor made out of planks, held together by tied-up strings. Fragile, bulky as hell but atleast it protects your fleshy bits.

name: birch bark basket
description: A simple basket, strung from fiber-intertwined birch bark around a simple frame. Cannot hold much, feels wobbly and is quite encumbering, but better than not having any place to put things.
